comments:
- create a new, clean environment (20020402) 
- bring up this new Eclipse
- File->Import->External Plugins and Fragments->Select All
- Perspective->Show View->Other->CVS Repositories
- right click in CVS Repositories view
- New-> CVS Respository Location...
- go to dev.eclipse.org
- select any one (or all) of org.eclipse.core.runtime, 
org.eclipse.core.resources, org.eclipse.boot
- right click and select Check out as Project
- you get a dialog box telling you that this project already exists, Do you 
want to overwrite
- I clicked on 'Yes to all'
- next dialog box indicated there was an 'Internal error'
- the log file contained the following call stack:

Log: Wed Apr 03 14:21:57 EST 2002
4 org.eclipse.team.ui 1 Internal error occured.
java.lang.NullPointerException

As a workaround, delete the projects org.eclipse.core.{runtime,boot,resources} 
and all their disk contents.  Then do the 'Check out as project'.  All works 
just fine.
*** Bug 12834 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***
